              with
               
              foul
               
              incest
               
              to
               
              abuse
               
              your
               
              soul
              ;

speaker: PERICLES
text:
Where
               
              now
               
              you’re
               
              both
               
              a
               
              father
               
              and
               
              a
               
              son

speaker: PERICLES
text:
By
               
              your
               
              untimely
               
              claspings
               
              with
               
              your
               
              child
              ,

speaker: PERICLES
text:
Which
               
              pleasures
               
              fits
               
              a
               
              husband
              ,
               
              not
               
              a
               
              father
              ,

speaker: PERICLES
text:
And
               
              she
               
              an
               
              eater
               
              of
               
              her
               
              mother’s
               
              flesh

speaker: PERICLES
text:
By
               
              the
               
              defiling
               
              of
               
              her
               
              parents’
               
              bed
              ;

speaker: PERICLES
text:
And
               
              both
               
              like
               
              serpents
               
              are
              ,
               
              who
              ,
               
              though
               
              they
               
              feed

speaker: PERICLES
text:
On
               
              sweetest
               
              flowers
              ,
               
              yet
               
              they
               
              poison
               
              breed
              .

speaker: PERICLES
text:
Antioch
              ,
               
              farewell
              ,
               
              for
               
              wisdom
               
              sees
               
              those
               
              men

speaker: PERICLES
text:
Blush
               
              not
               
              in
               
              actions
               
              blacker
               
              than
               
              the
               
              night

speaker: PERICLES
text:
Will
               
              ’schew
               
              no
               
              course
               
              to
               
              keep
               
              them
               
              from
               
              the
               
              light
              .

speaker: PERICLES
text:
One
               
              sin
              ,
               
              I
               
              know
              ,
               
              another
               
              doth
               
              provoke
              ;

speaker: PERICLES
text:
Murder’s
               
              as
               
              near
               
              to
               
              lust
               
              as
               
              flame
               
              to
               
              smoke
              .

speaker: PERICLES
text:
Poison
               
              and
               
              treason
               
              are
               
              the
               
              hands
               
              of
               
              sin
              ,

speaker: PERICLES
text:
Ay
              ,
               
              and
               
              the
               
              targets
               
              to
               
              put
               
              off
               
              the
               
              shame
              .

speaker: PERICLES
text:
Then
              ,
               
              lest
               
              my
               
              life
               
              be
               
              cropped
               
              to
               
              keep
               
              you
               
              clear
              ,

speaker: PERICLES
text:
By
               
              flight
               
              I’ll
               
              shun
               
              the
               
              danger
               
              which
               
              I
               
              fear
              .

speaker: ANTIOCHUS
text:
He
               
              hath
               
              found
               
              the
               
              meaning
              ,

speaker: ANTIOCHUS
text:
For
               
              which
               
              we
               
              mean
               
              to
               
              have
               
              his
               
              head
              .

speaker: ANTIOCHUS
text:
He
               
              must
               
              not
               
              live
               
              to
               
              trumpet
               
              forth
               
              my
               
              infamy
              ,

speaker: ANTIOCHUS
text:
Nor
               
              tell
               
              the
               
              world
               
              Antiochus
               
              doth
               
              sin

speaker: ANTIOCHUS
text:
In
               
              such
               
              a
               
              loathèd
               
              manner
              .

speaker: ANTIOCHUS
text:
And
               
              therefore
               
              instantly
               
              this
               
              prince
               
              must
               
              die
              ,

speaker: ANTIOCHUS
text:
For
               
              by
               
              his
               
              fall
               
              my
               
              honor
               
              must
               
              keep
               
              high
              .
              —

speaker: ANTIOCHUS
text:
Who
               
              attends
               
              us
               
              there
              ?

speaker: THALIARD
text:
Doth
               
              your
               
              Highness
               
              call
              ?

speaker: ANTIOCHUS
text:
Thaliard
              ,
               
              you
               
              are
               
              of
               
              our
               
              chamber
              ,
               
              Thaliard
              ,

speaker: ANTIOCHUS
text:
And
               
              our
               
              mind
               
              partakes
               
              her
               
              private
               
              actions

speaker: ANTIOCHUS
text:
To
               
              your
               
              secrecy
              ;
               
              and
               
              for
               
              your
               
              faithfulness

speaker: ANTIOCHUS
text:
We
               
              will
               
              advance
               
              you
              ,
               
              Thaliard
              .
               
              Behold
              ,

speaker: ANTIOCHUS
text:
Here’s
               
              poison
              ,
               
              and
               
              here’s
               
              gold
              .

speaker: ANTIOCHUS
text:
We
               
              hate
               
              the
               
              Prince

speaker: ANTIOCHUS
text:
Of
               
              Tyre
              ,
               
              and
               
              thou
               
              must
               
              kill
               
              him
              .
               
              It
               
              fits
               
              thee
               
              not

speaker: ANTIOCHUS
text:
To
               
              ask
               
              the
               
              reason
               
              why
              :
               
              because
               
              we
               
              bid
               
              it
              .

speaker: ANTIOCHUS
text:
Say
              ,
               
              is
               
              it
               
              done
              ?

speaker: THALIARD
text:
My
               
              lord
              ,
               
              ’tis
               
              done
              .

speaker: ANTIOCHUS
text:
Enough
              .

speaker: ANTIOCHUS
text:
Let
               
              your
               
              breath
               
              cool
               
              yourself
              ,
               
              telling
               
              your
               
              haste
              .

speaker: MESSENGER
text:
My
               
              lord
              ,
               
              Prince
               
              Pericles
               
              is
               
              fled
              .

speaker: ANTIOCHUS
text:
As
               
              thou
               
              wilt
               
              live
              ,
               
              fly
               
              after
              ,
              
              and
               
              like
               
              an
               
              arrow
               
              shot
               
              from
               
              a
               
              well-experienced
              
              archer
               
              hits
               
              the
               
              mark
               
              his
               
              eye
               
              doth
               
              level
               
              at
              ,
               
              so
               
              thou
              
              never
               
              return
               
              unless
               
              thou
               
              say
               
              Prince
               
              Pericles
               
              is
              
              dead
              .

speaker: THALIARD
text:
My
               
              lord
              ,
               
              if
               
              I
               
              can
               
              get
               
              him
               
              within
               
              my
               
              pistol’s
              
              length
              ,
               
              I’ll
               
              make
               
              him
               
              sure
               
              enough
              .
               
              So
              ,
               
              farewell
               
              to
              
              your
               
              Highness
              .

speaker: ANTIOCHUS
text:
Thaliard
              ,
               
              adieu
              .
               
              Till
               
              Pericles
               
              be
               
              dead
              ,

speaker: ANTIOCHUS
text:
My
               
              heart
               
              can
               
              lend
               
              no
               
              succor
               
              to
               
              my
               
              head
              .
